params.calls: list of call data and destination

params.nonce: value of nonce sent as part of the forward call
params.signer: address to check and update nonce for

params.message: .innerMessageHash extra data hashed that can be used as embedded message for implementing more complex scenario, with one sig
params.signatureType: signatureType either EOA, EIP1271 or EIP1654
